n0:createSxmlObject.n0:source: <VIEW xmlns="http://xmlns.oracle.com/ku" version="1.0"> <SCHEMA>W_YEHUD_TEST</SCHEMA> <NAME>ALL_BANKS_BI</NAME> <COL_LIST> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>BANK_CODE</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>BANK_NAME</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>BRANCH_CODE</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>BRANCH_NAME</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> </COL_LIST> <SUBQUERY>SELECT h.Bank_Code, b.bank_name, h.Branch_Code, h.Branch_Name FROM Rm_Branch_Codes h, Rm_Bank_Codes b WHERE h.Stamp_Action <> 'D' AND b.Stamp_Action <> 'D' AND h.Bank_Code = b.Bank_code AND h.Branch_Type = b.Branch_Type AND h.Branch_Type = 1</SUBQUERY> </VIEW>
